Summary My Story & Qualifications: 
I entered into the computer networking industry in late 2010, after working as a bartender throughout college. I first heard about opportunities in the field after talking with a customer at the bar, who told me about the Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification. I bought the book, took the test, and became certified! After that I kept going and obtained my Cisco Certified Network Professional (CCNP) Certification in August 2012. I then completed the written exam and the lab for the Cisco Certified Internetwork Expert (CCIE) Program in March, 2013. My CCIE number is 38,549. I recertified my R&S CCIE in March 2014.
